pci_projects_project_network_private_vra: You have not yet created a private network.
Connect your instances across private networks with the OVH vRack, wherever they are located.

You can instantly create private networks on demand. They guarantee level 2 isolation and are compatible with DHCP service to automatically deliver IP addressing to your instances. Each private network can be deployed in a single location or it can connect all of your project regions together.
Your private networks form your vRack. They can then be connected to other OVH solutions within this same vRack, using a commun VLAN ID.
